settings.label: Enable lazy loading sections
settings.info: This will enable lazy loading of sections. Can improve performance.

settings.label: Home page eager section count
settings.info: Specify the number of sections to load beforehand from the top on the home page. This excludes the header and footer sections by default.

settings.label: Product page eager section count
settings.info: Specify the number of sections to load beforehand from the top on the product page. This excludes the header and footer sections by default.

settings.label: Collection page eager section count
settings.info: Specify the number of sections to load beforehand from the top on the collection page. This excludes the header and footer sections by default.

settings.label: Enable lazy loadinbeowg Header Sections
settings.info: This option allows you to enable lazy loading of header sections, which can be useful for lazy loading mega menu item sections. Can improve performance.

settings.label: Header eager section count
settings.info: Specify how many sections to load in advance from the top in header. Be careful not to include sections that are 'mega menu items' in the count.

settings.label: Low stock threshold
settings.info: This is the limit product stock count will have to hit for applicable products to change to call to buy

settings.label: Size order
settings.info: Sizes must be coma separated with no white space inbetween comas.
